system.effect: Creature or thing is implanted with some kind of control mechanism which restricts how it can behave. Whilst useful for maintaining consistency should a creature be presented with a situation outside of its programming, and no recognised master to provide orders, it must pass a +20 Intelligence Test or be Stunned for 1 Round. Due to the mindlessness of the creature, it is immune to all Opposed Social Tests.
